title: CAC Delists Over 400,000 Inactive Companies in Nigeria

title: High blood pressure drug recalled over low blood pressure pill mix-up
desc: Health Canada is recalling two lots of MAR-Amlodipine after some bottles were found to contain midodrine, a medication used to treat low blood pressure.
